price: Alif Laam Raa.[1] Iki ni igitabo kigizwe n’imirongo yasobekanywe ubushishozi, hanyuma isesengurwa na Nyirubugenge buhambaye, Umumenyi wa byose.
arabic: الٓرۚ كِتَٰبٌ أُحۡكِمَتۡ ءَايَٰتُهُۥ ثُمَّ فُصِّلَتۡ مِن لَّدُنۡ حَكِيمٍ خَبِيرٍ
footnotes: [1] Alif Laam Raa: Inyuguti nk’izi twazivuzeho mu ntangiriro ya Surat Al Baqarat.

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: alif-lam-ra kitābun uḥ'kimat āyātuhu thumma fuṣṣilat min ladun ḥakīmin khabīrin
